A.name: Man and His Occupations
A.description: Signs depicting human figures, actions, or roles such as seated man, king, or soldier.

B.name: Woman and Her Occupations
B.description: Signs of women, female roles, or activities like seated woman or queen.

C.name: Anthropomorphic Deities
C.description: Deities with human-like forms, such as gods like Osiris or Horus.

D.name: Parts of the Human Body
D.description: Body parts like eye, hand, or leg.

E.name: Mammals
E.description: Mammalian animals, including cat, lion, or cow.

F.name: Parts of Mammals
F.description: Animal body parts such as horn or tail.

G.name: Birds
G.description: Bird species and related signs, like owl or vulture.

H.name: Parts of Birds
H.description: Bird body parts, such as wing or feather.

I.name: Amphibious Animals, Reptiles, etc.
I.description: Reptiles and amphibians, like snake or crocodile.

K.name: Fish and Parts of Fish
K.description: Fish and fish-related signs, such as fish or fin.

L.name: Invertebrates and Lesser Animals
L.description: Insects and small creatures, like bee or scorpion.

M.name: Trees and Plants
M.description: Vegetation, such as reed or lotus.

N.name: Sky, Earth, Water
N.description: Natural features like sky, mountain, or water.

O.name: Buildings, Parts of Buildings, etc.
O.description: Architectural elements, such as house or pyramid.

P.name: Ships, Parts of Ships, etc.
P.description: Watercraft and related signs, like boat or sail.

Q.name: Domestic and Funerary Furniture
Q.description: Household items, such as chair or bed.

R.name: Temple Furniture and Sacred Emblems
R.description: Religious objects, like altar or ankh.

S.name: Crowns, Dress, Staves, etc.
S.description: Regalia and symbols of power, such as crown or scepter.

T.name: Warfare, Hunting, Butchery
T.description: Weapons and tools, like bow or knife.

U.name: Agriculture, Crafts, and Professions
U.description: Tools and activities, such as plow or adze.

V.name: Rope, Fiber, Baskets, Bags, etc.
V.description: Cordage and containers, like rope or basket.

W.name: Vessels of Stone and Earthenware
W.description: Containers, such as jar or pot.

X.name: Loaves and Cakes
X.description: Bread and food items, like loaf.

Y.name: Writings, Games, Music
Y.description: Cultural objects, such as scroll or harp.

Z.name: Strokes, Signs Derived from Hieratic, Geometrical Figures
Z.description: Lines and shapes, like single stroke.

AA.name: Unclassified
AA.description: Miscellaneous signs not fitting other categories.
